58.heading: Sylli.
58.title: "La Route des Goëlands"
58.author: scénario, Sylli ; dessins, Ab Aigre.
notes: Summary from contents page of no. 35: Anyline tries, at the request of her mother, to find her father. She leaves the Antilles and goes to Lausanne, where a museum is showing the works of Victor Blanchenoud, an artist who has been locked up for years.

59.heading: Sylli.
59.title: "La Route des Goëlands"
59.author: scénario, Sylli ; dessins, Ab Aigre.
notes: Summary from contents page of no. 36: The mystery around the life and death of Victor Blanchenoud deepens with strange events: the arrest of a crazy man, the theft of a statue. The intervention of journalist R. Netz prompts Anyline to pursue her own investigation.

60.heading: Sylli.
60.title: "La Route des Goëlands"
60.author: scénario, Sylli ; dessins, Ab Aigre.
notes: Summary from contents page of no. 37: Anyline finds the journal of her father, Victor Blanchenoud. This tells the story of his meeting with Cerisier, the painter, and Manuia, the native faithful to the charm and menace of the Tiki.

61.heading: Sylli.
61.title: "La Route des Goëlands"
61.author: scénario, Sylli ; dessins, Ab Aigre.
notes: Summary from contents page of no. 38: The story of Blanchenoud shows us his return to Switzerland, the relations of his wife with Von Glütz, the end of his sanity. Despite his struggle to preserve his rights, he feels imprisoned by evil; science may prefer to believe in folly and ignore the Tiki...

62.heading: Sylli.
62.title: "La Route des Goëlands"
62.author: scénario, Sylli ; dessins, Ab Aigre.
notes: Summary from contents page of no. 39: Accused of murder and locked up as insane, Blanchenoud spends his time making statues. Strangely, they recall the double curse of the Tiki.

notes: Summary: The Goddess Viagra thinks the pill that bears her name will enhance the safety of rhinos, and other large animals.

129.title: Sylvia
129.author: Nicole Hollander.
129.series: Sept. 8, 1998) "Time Passes Differently for Dogs and Cats"
notes: Summary: The dog waits patiently and nervously, and the cat decides the master's late and leaves a hairball on the way out.

130.title: Sylvia
130.author: Nicole Hollander.
130.series: Oct. 14, 1998) "A Texan's Paying Five Million Dollars to Have His Dog Cloned"*
notes: (Bad Girl Science Chats)

131.title: Sylvia
131.author: Nicole Hollander.
131.series: Nov. 4, 1998) "Are There That Many Stars Lined Up to Have Sex With Men in Polyester Pants?"*
notes: (Bad Girl Chats)
Summary: Most golfers would pass up sex with a movie star to shoot par.

132.title: Sylvia
132.author: Nicole Hollander.
132.series: Feb. 5, 1999) "Engraved with the Message, 'I Love You More Than Golf'"*
notes: Summary: Sylvia contemplates a gold bracelet.

133.title: Sylvia
133.author: Nicole Hollander.
133.series: July 10, 1999) "Rita, Get Me A Vat Of Oil"*
notes: Summary: Extra-virgin olive oil can prevent "age-related cognitive decline." Yuppies will rule the world.

134.title: Sylvia
134.author: Nicole Hollander.
134.series: Sept. 1, 1999) "I Think It Has to do with Open Spaces and Golf Clubs"*
notes: Summary: Proof of the goddess: More men than women are struck by lightning.

135.title: Sylvia
135.author: Nicole Hollander.
135.series: Sept. 22, 2000) "Anything's Possible, Ma. Oh, Look, There's a Shark in the Sink"*
notes: Summary: Sylvia hears about a daughter mistaken for her mother, and thinks that might have been them.

136.title: Sylvia
136.author: by Nicole Hollander.
136.series: Oct. 20, 2000) "Honey, I Think Lawn Care Before Work Might Be Too Stimulating"*
notes: Summary: Speculation about specialized van pools (dating van for singles, lawn care van for marrieds) to ease traffic congestion.

137.title: Sylvia
137.author: by Nicole Hollander.
137.series: Dec. 2, 2000) "Rita, Honey, Sprinkle a Little Couscous on These Donuts"*
notes: Summary: Sylvia hears about the importance of whole grains.

138.title: Sylvia
138.author: Nicole Hollander.
138.series: Dec. 23, 2000) "The Dogs From Hell Christmas Boutique"*
notes: Summary: The dogs lure male shoppers by saying, among other things, that they can hit a bucket of balls while they shop.

139.title: Sylvia
139.author: Nicole Hollander.
139.series: June 15, 2002) "They Want You To Drop By for Their Father's Day Lawnmower Parade and Barbecue"*
notes: Summary: The Alpha Centaurians will pick him up on the roof.

140.title: Sylvia
140.author: Nicole Hollander.
140.series: July 19, 2002) "Ma, Do We Have Any Ketchup That Isn't Green or Purple?"*
notes: Summary: Lots of new ideas. Visitors from Muslim countries should be fingerprinted. C-sections to get caviar from sturgeons. Tummy tucks to look like Britney Spears. Blue and pink margarine.
